Spears::

She face went blank as he spoke the words. "He..killed 
a...maximal..and they were firing on...him.." She felt her legs get 
weak and she put a hand on Firearm's shoulder to hold herself stable.
She knew that if Striker was in anyway retreivable, he wouldn't be 
firing on and killing maximals. She stood there, shaking. He was no 
onger Striker and that her love was gone for good.

"He's......gone....then.." she whispered.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Urg ... I forgot how long Spears was with the Trainers..
> 
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm shruggs at her first question. "I'm not really sure, I 
wasn't 
> working on it from the beginning. You might want to ask Ramulus 
about 
> it."
> 
> He frowns at her rescue suggestion. "The Trainers probably know 
you're 
> back. We won a battle and they retreated, Smokescreen got you back 
to 
> the Ark."
> 
> He remembers Spears' preformance back at the Ark, "Where you did a 
> great acting job, I may add."
> 
> Firearm's face turns serious again, thinking over her plan, "But I 
> doubt the plan will work. They would probably know that the chip 
has 
> been destroyed. Besides, from how Slayer showed himself at the 
battle, 
> he's not a bot that would be easily disabled."
> 
> He sighs, "He killed Snow Cat and nearly took out Ramulus as well. 
> With four or five Maximals shooting at him."
> 
> As soon as the words left his mouth, he knew he shouldn't have said 
> them, but it was too late.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Spears::
> > 
> > She looked at him and listened. "I was with the Trainer for a 
while? 
> > How long was I with them? And how is it that I came back, but he 
> > didn't?" She a million and one questions run through her mind.
> > 
> > "Does he know that I'm back with you? If not, I may hav a plan to 
> get 
> > him back. I can go back to the trainers, and pretend to still be 
one 
> > of them. Then I can get close to Striker, possably deactivate him 
> and 
> > haul him
